[theemo](./theemo.md) &gt; [ReaderTool](./theemo.readertool.md)

## ReaderTool interface

This is for tools used during the `sync` command to read tokens from most of a the time a design tool.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ReaderTool 
```

## Example

Figma may be your tool for reading tokens. This will call the API evalute the response and returns a token collection

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [read()](./theemo.readertool.read.md) | Reads a collection of tokens off the tool |
